title: Baixue Gongzhu He San Zhi Xiao Zhu
synopsis: Snow White (voiced by Ni Hongjie) has a beautiful appearance and a kind personality, and is deeply loved by the people. The Snow Queen (voiced by Gu Zi) sends her to the Elf Kingdom, hoping she will live a happy life there. In an accident, Snow White accidentally fell off the cliff. Although she was not injured, she lost her memory. Chi Bao (voiced by Ma Xiaoji), Meng Bao (voiced by Ye Zixuan) and Pi Bao (voiced by Hu Jiamu) are three cute little pigs. They rescued Snow White who had nowhere to go and warmly invited her to live with them. In this way, Snow White and the cute three little pigs had a carefree happy time. The Snow Queen has been looking for Snow White’s traces. At the same time, the evil wolf grandmother (voiced by Ma Xiaoji) also sent her minions hunter (voiced by Chen Zhe) and Black Wolf (voiced by Zhao Mingzhou) to get ahead of the Snow Queen. Catch Snow White.(translated from douban)
